questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: With 1 million euros, I think that I would maybe become a little bit crazy.
Seriously, if I had 1 million euros, the firtst thing that I would do would be offering a lot of gifts to my family. Espacially to my parents, my brothers and my little nephew (who is too cute).
Then I would certainly do a lot of shopping!! In Paris, in Milan or in Barcelona, it would be better than in Belgium...

One of my dream is to travel around the world, to discover a lot of new countries, new populations, new languages and new cultures. It would be preferable to do this travel with a car, it's more typical.
